events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred on April 30th, causing damage to the front bumper and headlights.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident following review of the initial report and damage description.
An agent has been assigned to handle the auto accident claim and will contact the customer shortly to assist with next steps.
The customer received confirmation that their auto accident claim has been acknowledged and is under processing.
The customer was asked to provide photographs of the vehicle damage and a copy of the police report for claim verification.
Received the requested photos and police report submitted by the customer to support the auto accident claim.
Investigation into the collision details and vehicle damage was initiated to determine the claim's validity.
The investigation confirmed the reported accident circumstances and approved the extent of damages claimed by the customer.
A settlement amount was proposed based on damage estimates and policy coverage; awaiting customer's agreement.
Customer provided feedback confirming acceptance of the proposed settlement and requested prompt processing of payment.
The claim was officially approved following customer's settlement acceptance and all required documents verification.
Payment for the approved auto accident claim was issued to the customer's registered bank account.
The auto accident claim has been closed after successful payment and confirmation that the customer is satisfied with the resolution.
All case files and documentation related to the auto accident claim have been archived for future reference if necessary.
